wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Donald Garner (1931-2019) was a British diplomat. He was Ambassador to Afghanistan from 1981 to 1984, although his term was disrupted by the Soviet-Afghan War. He was High Commissioner to the Gambia from 1984 to 1987.

response: *John Donald Garner, L.V.O., H.M. Consul-General, Houston.
